text: ane ame isra'ilana santanane samudra para karavyo, basa! Te loko eka koma pasethi pasara thaya, je'o potani ketalika murti'o la'ine betha hata, kaheva lagya ke he musa (a.Sa.)! Amara mate pana eka pujya avi ja rite nakki kari do, jevi rite a lokono che, musa (a.Sa.) Kahyum ke kharekhara tamari andara ghani ja ajnanata che
